title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 22 December 2014 - XWiki
content:
<cjd> has quit  
09:03 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:14 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:23 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:25 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:40 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
10:02 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:03 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:10 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
10:25 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: Hi, looks like yuicompressor does not like too much your changes on https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/bafb9bb796059275b9729473869af398e012f82d  
10:26 <tmortagne> (see http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform\_Quality\_Checks/638/console)  
10:26 <gdelhumeau> Hi  
10:26 <gdelhumeau> yuicompressor is not used there, AFAIK  
10:26 <gdelhumeau> but I'll take a look, thanks  
10:27 <tmortagne> seems to be used during the build on usersandgroups.js at least  
10:27 <gdelhumeau> ah ok  
10:27 <gdelhumeau> userandgroups, it  is possible  
10:28 <tmortagne> which is not what you touched seems to have touched in that commit but that's what jenkins say broke the build  
10:30 <tmortagne> probably more https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/f0aed029f9d7777c7873d03a027fa5d7993a682f  
10:30 <tmortagne> jenkins is not very good with very close commits  
10:35 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
10:54 <mosulica> has joined #xwiki  
11:00 <gdelhumeau> tmortagne: fixed, sorry  
11:01 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: was it a yuicompressor limitation ?  
11:01 <gdelhumeau> yes it is  
11:02 <gdelhumeau> I have written a comment in the source code  
12:30 <lucaa> has quit  
12:31 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
12:33 <lucaa> has quit  
12:34 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
12:44 <lucaa> has quit  
13:14 <gdelhumeau> tmortagne: the compilation is broken because of the class ExtensionRating which is missing in xwiki-platform-repository-server-api  
13:14 <gdelhumeau> tmortagne: are you aware about that?  
13:16 <tmortagne> ExtensionRating has nothing to do with xwiki-platform-repository-server-api it's part of xwiki-commons-extension-api  
13:17 <tmortagne> and as far as I can see it's there and xwiki-platform-repository-server-api does not give me any missing class in Eclipse  
13:19 <tmortagne> actually there is two, one in xwiki-commons-extension-api and the other in xwiki-commons-repository-model but both are here (otherwise commons itself could not build) so it's weird  
13:24 <tmortagne> actually it was building well and it started failing without any change to those classes  
13:24 <ClemensR> maybe trigger the commons build on jenkins a second time?  locally if I have weird missing dependency problems, running maven a second time fixes this sometimes.  
13:28 <tmortagne> there is something very weird on maven.xwiki.org snapshot repository, all the 6.4-SNAPSHOT jar I see on http://maven.xwiki.org/snapshots/org/xwiki/commons/ are very old  
13:28 <tmortagne> for example http://maven.xwiki.org/snapshots/org/xwiki/commons/xwiki-commons-properties/6.4-SNAPSHOT/  
13:28 <tmortagne> 04-Dec-2014  
13:28 <mosulica> has left #xwiki  
13:28 <tmortagne> repository model is 01-Dec-2014  
13:29 <tmortagne> and it's indeed far from being up to date...  
13:32 <tmortagne> forcing commons rebuild  
13:35 <ClemensR> not all jar, for example http://maven.xwiki.org/snapshots/org/xwiki/commons/xwiki-commons-crypto-common/6.4-SNAPSHOT/  is current ... but a lot of them are  
13:36 <ClemensR> weird enough in any case  
13:44 <tmortagne> all the current jars are just been built  
13:44 <tmortagne> i.e. after whatever happend  
13:44 <Lyes> has quit  
13:44 <tmortagne> for example in http://maven.xwiki.org/snapshots/org/xwiki/commons/xwiki-commons-crypto-common/6.4-SNAPSHOT/ you have two dates  
13:44 <tmortagne> the old 04-Dec-2014 and the new 22-Dec-2014 that just been built  
13:44 <ClemensR> yes, build on jenkins succeeded  
13:45 <tmortagne> for some reason the snapshot repository has been reseted to an old state  
13:45 <ClemensR> so maybe I have been looking while the build was already running ...  
13:45 <tmortagne> checking released jars  
13:45 <tmortagne> hope it's only snapshot...  
13:46 <tmortagne> releases seems ok so it's something related to snapshots  
13:46 <tmortagne> but according to Nexus log, its snapshot cleanup has been run last night  
13:47 <ClemensR> well, the last common-build  is from 04.12. (except for #105, which only buils a subset, for some reason)  
13:59 <tmortagne> hmm #103 to #107 have been built today but they all seems very limited indeed, but I have the right model since a while without building it so I don't understand  
13:59 <tmortagne> anyway it should be ok now  
14:13 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
14:28 <Lyes> has quit  
14:34 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
15:26 <gsmeria> has quit  
15:35 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
15:42 <gsmeria> has quit  
15:59 <ClemensR> has left #xwiki  
16:04 <alex\_ccr> has joined #xwiki  
16:05 <alex\_ccr> Hi, I've a trouble deleting a wiki page (created from an Office document). Can U help me please ?  
16:05 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki  
16:05 <alex\_ccr> I've put a slash in a name of a document and now I can't rename or remove it :(  
16:12 <alex\_ccr> Is it possible to remove it through a SQL query ? I can see the record in the xwikidoc table  
16:26 <momomomomo\_> has joined #xwiki  
16:30 <momomomomo> has quit  
16:30 <momomomomo\_> is now known as <momomomomo>  
16:31 <tmortagne> alex\_ccr: if you are using tomcat you are probably hitting http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XE-688, you can configure it to not break / anymore see the comments of the jira issue  
16:41 <alex\_ccr> I've just change catalina options, I'll tell U if it works  
16:42 <alex\_ccr> :)  
16:49 <alex\_ccr> I'm sorry, there is no change, I still have a blank page when I clic on it, or a "please contact the administrator" message when I replace the %2F in the URL by a "/"  
16:49 <alex\_ccr> :(  
16:56 <alex\_ccr> is it possible to edit a page thanks to the ID, instead og te fullname ?  
16:56 <alex\_ccr> instead of\*  
16:57 <tmortagne> I think apache httpd has such filter too  
16:58 <tmortagne> you can't access a page by id in the UI but with a script you can do whatever you want since it won't go trough URLs  
17:04 <alex\_ccr> Can you help me to find a script like that, please ?  
17:45 <gdelhumeau> alex\_ccr:  
17:45 <gdelhumeau> $xwiki.getDocument($services.model.createDocumentReference('', 'Space', 'PageWith/inIt')).delete()  
17:46 <gdelhumeau> inside {{velocity}}{{/velocity}}  
17:49 <momomomomo> has quit  
18:00 <alex\_ccr> for example, if the space is "mon espace" and the page is "ma page avec/un/slash", the velocity code is :  
18:00 <alex\_ccr> $xwiki.getDocument($services.model.createDocumentReference('', 'Mon espace', 'ma page avec/un/slash')).delete()  
18:01 <alex\_ccr> ?  
18:04 <alex\_ccr> ...because it doesn't work :(  
18:12 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki  
18:14 <lucaa> has quit  
18:14 <momomomomo> has quit  
18:19 <woshilapin> has quit  
18:22 <alex\_ccr> I'm sorry, I've to go. Good evening  
18:23 <alex\_ccr> has quit  
18:27 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki

22:28 <momomomomo> has quit  
22:31 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
22:34 <janepe> has joined #xwiki  
22:34 <cjd> has left #xwiki  
22:39 <janepe> Hello, I've installed bunch of extensions to main wiki but i would like to install them to entire farm. Unfortunately in administration panel there is no button "Install on farm" since there came "Uninstall" button  
22:40 <janepe> The other thing is extensions installed on farm will be applied to newly created wiki's?  
22:44 <gsmeria> has quit  
22:57 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki

23:13 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki
